objects.text:
• Frosted glass with elegant gold accents
• Three-piece set: serum, cream & treatment
• Airless pump technology
• Minimalist aesthetic design

product_details.name: Luxury Skincare Essentials Set | Premium Beauty Collection
product_details.description:
• Premium frosted glass packaging with elegant gold accents
• Three-piece skincare set including serum pump bottle, cream jar, and treatment tube
• Professional-grade dispensing system with airless pump technology
• Minimalist aesthetic design perfect for modern vanity display
• Travel-friendly sizes for on-the-go skincare routine
• High-end matte finish containers for sophisticated look and feel
• Hygienic and protective packaging to maintain product integrity
• Coordinated set in soft nude and white color scheme
• Easy-to-use dispensing solutions for precise application
• Ideal for luxury skincare formulations and premium beauty products

banner_details:
This banner features a premium skincare promotional design that combines elegance and minimalism. A soft beige background with concentric circular overlays and delicate border lines forms the backdrop, giving a classy and calming aesthetic. The heading layers (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) are bold serif texts styled in a warm bronze hue, highlighting luxury and quality. Below, the subheading (`subheading`) introduces the collection in a sleek modern font, maintaining a subtle and sophisticated tone. Key product features are outlined in a bulleted list (`description`) with clear alignment and legible styling. A rectangular CTA button (`cta_button`) hosts the action text (`cta`), paired with prominent pricing (`price`) to drive conversions. The right side prominently showcases the product (`product_image`) in soft lighting and neutral tones.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F7F3EF (Cream White)
- Accent Border & Shapes: #D4A990 (Soft Gold)
- Headings: #C49A6C (Bronze Tan)
- Subheading: #B38B68 (Muted Brown)
- Description Text: #805E3F (Deep Beige)
- Button Background: #C49A6C
- Button Text: #FFFFFF (White)
product_color: The product image features a clean, minimalist aesthetic with a soft and elegant color palette. Dominant colors include a warm beige (#EAD9C3), off-white cream (#F7F4EF), light peach (#F5D3C2), and an accent of metallic gold (#D5B98F). These colors harmonize to create a luxurious yet understated look. The blending of neutral tones allows each product piece to look cohesive while still being individually distinguishable. The gold cap provides a subtle highlight, adding a premium feel without overpowering the softness. This palette is ideal for beauty or skincare advertisement banners, projecting sophistication, cleanliness, and elegance.
